Paragraph: The HOMO of PCDSeBT is well - distributed along the conjugated chains ; its LUMO is mainly centralized on BT accepting core as shaped by orbital lobes , being predicted a p - type organic semiconductor.

| --- |
| HOMO of PCDSeBT |
| LUMO of BT accepting core |

Paragraph: The HOMO of PCDSeBT is well - distributed along the conjugated chains ; its LUMO is mainly centralized on BT accepting core as shaped by orbital lobes , being predicted a p - type organic semiconductor.

Let's think step by step.

| Property Name |
| --- |
| HOMO of PCDSeBT |
| LUMO of PCDSeBT |
| conjugated chains of PCDSeBT |
| BT accepting core |
| orbital lobes |
| predicted p-type organic semiconductor |

Please remove entities that do not clearly refer to "Material property" and present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Property Name".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

| Property Name |
| --- |
| HOMO of PCDSeBT |
| LUMO of PCDSeBT |
| conjugated chains of PCDSeBT |
| BT accepting core |
| orbital lobes |

Note: HOMO (Highest Occupied Molecular Orbital) and LUMO (Lowest Unoccupied Molecular Orbital) are material properties that describe the electronic structure of a molecule or material. The other entities in the list can also be considered material properties as they describe specific aspects of the PCDSeBT material.
